Shortsword Light Finesse

Steelforged Sword is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Diappable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

Though the grip's leather is old and crusty, it shows no signs of wear, and not a single scratch mars the slender blade.
